desc: Lilly Grant Candle Studio is a boutique candle manufacturing studio based in Chicago, IL. All candles are handcrafted candles using high quality materials. Each candle is handcrafted using 100% soy wax from American-grown soybeans, phthalate free fragrance oils, and lead-free cotton wicks.

layout.text: TRY OUR NEW LAVENDER & ROSE BATH SALT
